name: Candy Corn Caves
description:
This is a game intended for the Pocket Platformer Halloween Jam. I missed the deadline, but you can enjoy it anyway! It's a simple platformer, short and sweet. Enjoy!

GAME CONTROLS

  • WASD or Arrow Keys to move
  • Jump: c / j
  • Dash: x / k

Engine supports game controllers, but it’s untested for this game.

GAME ENGINE

Pocket Platformer https://the-l0bster.itch.io/pocket-platformer

Game Jam: https://itch.io/jam/pocket-platformer-halloween-jam

MUSIC

"Aquarium" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
